item.title: Marvin Gaye - What's Going On - Ukulele Play-Alongs!
item.description: Play along video for the song What's Going On by Marvin Gaye from the channel Ukulele Play-Alongs!. Chords used in the song: Am11, B, B9♯5, C♯m7, Emaj7, F♯m.

item.title: Michael Crawford - The Music of the Night - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song The Music of the Night by Michael Crawford from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A♭, B, B♭, C, C♯m, D, D7, Dm, E, Em, E♭, F, G, G7.

item.title: Sting - Shape Of My Heart - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Shape Of My Heart by Sting from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: Am, Am7, B, C, D, Em, F♯, F♯7, F♯m, F♯m7, G.

item.title: Dulce Pontes - Lela - Key of Am - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Lela by Dulce Pontes from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, Amadd9, B, Cmaj7, Dm, E7, F, G7.

item.title: George Harrison - My Sweet Lord - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song My Sweet Lord by George Harrison from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, B, B7, Bm, C♯7, D, D7, E, Em, F♯dim7, F♯m, G♯dim7.

item.title: Otis Redding - Sittin' On The Dock Of The Bay - Key of G - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Sittin' On The Dock Of The Bay by Otis Redding from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: A, B, C, D, E7, F, G.

item.title: Radiohead - Creep - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Creep by Radiohead from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: B, C, Cm, G.

item.title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Ukulele Play Along - Key of G - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
Bobby McFerrin - Don't Worry, Be Happy - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Don't Worry, Be Happy by Bobby McFerrin from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: B, C♯m, E.

item.title: Ledward Ka'apana - I Kona - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song I Kona by Ledward Ka'apana from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B, B♭, C, Csus4, D7, G7.

item.title: Billy Joel - Just The Way You Are - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Just The Way You Are by Billy Joel from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B, B7, Bm7, D, Dm, Dmaj7, E, Em, Esus4, F, F♯m, F♯m6, G.

item.title: Memory from "Cats" - Ukulele Play Along - Keys of A, C - Daniel Simmons
Micah P. Hinson - Beneath the Rose - BruderMaister
item.description: Play along video for the song Beneath the Rose by Micah P. Hinson from the channel BruderMaister. Chords used in the song: B, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Naomi Scott - Speechless - Key of Em - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Speechless by Naomi Scott from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, B, Bm7, Bsus4, C, D, D7, Em, G.

item.title: Metallica - Nothing Else Matters - Key of Em - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Nothing Else Matters by Metallica from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: A, B, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Michael Bublé - Someday - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Someday by Michael Bublé from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: A, Am, B, C, Cm, D7, Em7, G.
